thread.title: Adele sweeps Grammys Awards with 5 wins, while Bowie wins 4
thread.title_full: Adele sweeps Grammys Awards with 5 wins, while Bowie wins 4

author: MESFIN FEKADU
title: Adele sweeps Grammys Awards with 5 wins, while Bowie wins 4
text:
One dead after earlier two-car crash near Queenstown ... more soon Adele sweeps Grammys Awards with 5 wins, while Bowie wins 4 MESFIN FEKADU Last updated 17:55, February 13 2017 Other 
Adele turned her back to the audience and held her head in embarrassment. But her peers stepped up. 
Even though Adele flubbed during her live performance at the Grammys, she walked away the belle of the ball. 
She took home five awards Sunday night, including album, record and song of the year. 
She beat Beyonce in the top three categories with her comeback album 25 , and repeated her accomplishments from 2012, when the British star also won album, song and record of the year at the Grammys. Kevin Winter 
Adele performs onstage during The 59th GRAMMY Awards. 
She used her speech to honour Beyonce and her groundbreaking Lemonade album, which was also nominated.
